admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The Export Oriented Industries Project
            will support the Government's policy of rapidly
            expanding Turkish exports. TSKB is being used as an
            instrument to facilitate this national objective. The loan
            will: (i) finance private sector manufacturing investments
            with emphasis on investments expected to lead to exports;
            (ii) provide foreign exchange required for imported inputs
            needed by exporters; and (iii) assist TSKB's export
            promotion capability through diagnosis of problems of firms
            with export potential, export market evaluation, provision
            of an advisory and marketing consultancy service to
            potential exporters, staff training, and financing of
            technical assistance.
